text:
Every year, Forbes release list of most powerful people in the world and it gives us a glimpse of all those who are doing exceedingly well in their respective fields.
This year too Forbes recently released the list of 100 Most Powerful Women in the world and four Indian women made it to the list. Four Indian women who made the cut in the list are:
1. Priyanka Chopra
Pinterest
2. CEO (HCL), Roshni Nadar Malhotra
Agencies
3. Entrepreneur Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 460 SHARES 161 SHARES
Agencies
4. Chairperson (HT Media), Shobhana Bhartia
Agencies
That's not all. Deepika Padukone has made it to the top five of Forbes India’s 2018 list of richest Indians, becoming the first woman to do so. Padukone's Padmaavat went on to break many records, raked in a phenomenal Rs 112.8 crore this year to become the highest-earning woman celebrity.
Agencies
Ranveer Singh is number eight with Rs 84.67 crores and Ajay Devgn ranks tenth on the list with Rs 74.5 crores.
According to the publication, there are 18 women on the list (which first came out in 2012) - down from 21 in 2017. Actors Alia Bhatt, Anushka Sharma, Katrina Kaif and shuttlers PV Sindhu, Saina Nehwal are part of the 100.
Priyanka Chopra lost her last year’s seventh rank (Rs 68 crore) and settled for No 49 with Rs 18 crore as earnings in 2018.
(With agency inputs)
title: Indian Women Top Forbes List, PC Among Most Powerful & Deepika Makes A Cut In Highest Paid
description: Every year, Forbes release list of most powerful people in the world and it gives us a glimpse of all those who are doing exceedingly well in their respective fields. This year too Forbes recently released the list of 100 Most Powerful Women in the world and four Indian women made it to the list.
